front.title: Mobile IPv4 Extension for Configuration Options Exchange

abstract.t: IP Mobility support for IPv4 [RFC3344] defines a short and skippable extension header format intended to extend the Mobile IP extension address space. Based on the format presented in [RFC3344], this draft defines a Mobile IP extension for configuration options, which SHOULD be used by any Mobile IP entity to exchange information of the network entities like DNS server address, previous Foreign Agent (FA) address, address of a session manager etc.
